Pinterest reports Q3 revenue up 17% YoY to $1.05B, MAUs up 12% to 600M, vs. 590M est., but forecasts Q4 revenue below est.; PINS drops 20% after hours  —  Pinterest shares tanked nearly 20% on Tuesday after the company reported third-quarter financial results that missed on earnings per share and provided weak guidance.

items.title: New CMF Headphone Pro with energy slider, ANC, interchangeable cups down at $84 low
items.summary:
Update: The $84 low on the new CMF Headphone Pro is now live again.

Shortly after the launch of Nothing’s flagship Headphone (1), it more affordable but equally as unique sub-brand CMF debuted its first over-ear headphones known as the CMF Headphone Pro. Today, over at Amazon, you’ll find them sitting back down at the lowest price we have tracked to date.

items.title: Dick Cheney's death a loss to the nation, says George W Bush
items.summary: Cheney became one of the most powerful vice-presidents in US history under Bush, and was a key architect in his "war on terror".

items.title: Iran releases two French nationals from detention
items.summary: Cécile Kohler and Jacques Paris are thought to have been the last French people held in Iran.

items.title: This new-release MagSafe car mount rotates a full 360 degrees at $16 (Reg. $25)
items.summary:
Lamicall 360-degree MagSafe Car Mount

Buy for $16 (Reg. $25)

Clip the on-page 20% off coupon.

What we love

This flexible MagSafe mount that debuted just over a month ago is ready to latch onto your windshield, dashboard, and more with a mechanical snap. Once locked into place, the entire unit can rotate 360 degrees and the MagSafe arm can be adjusted too so you can dial in the most ideal viewing angle.

items.summary: It's the second time this year Rivian has spun out a new company, after it created micromobility startup Also in March.

items.summary: Google is already zapping TPUs with radiation to get ready.

items.title: Get 1440p videos with a 140-degree view through VIOFO’s VS1 Mini dash cam at $104 (Reg. $140)
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, VIOFO is offering its VS1 Mini Dash Cam at $103.99 shipped. It’s coming down off its full $140 price tag that it’s been sitting at for most of October, even having been skipped over during Prime Day. We’ve seen discounts go lower in the past to $100 and a one-time $90 low from July’s Prime Day event, but you’re still looking at a solid 26% markdown here that cuts $36 off the going rate to land it at the third-best price we have tracked.

more…

items.title: Just $25 gets you lifetime access to the top AI models (Reg. up to $234)
items.summary:
For just $24.97, you can get lifetime access to 1min.AI, the all-in-one platform that brings together the world’s top AI models — including GPT-4o, Claude 3, Gemini Pro, Llama 3, and more.

items.title: Apple says Live Translation on AirPods will expand to the EU next month; the first iOS 26.2 beta, seeded to developers on Tuesday, brings the feature to the EU (Joe Rossignol/MacRumors)
items.summary:
Joe Rossignol / MacRumors:
Apple says Live Translation on AirPods will expand to the EU next month; the first iOS 26.2 beta, seeded to developers on Tuesday, brings the feature to the EU  —  The upcoming iOS 26.2 update for iPhone makes the Live Translation on AirPods feature available in the EU, according to Apple.

items.title: Google’s AI Mode gets new agentic capabilities to help book event tickets and beauty appointments
items.summary: For example, you can ask "find me 2 cheap tickets for the Shaboozey concert coming up. prefer standing floor tickets." AI Mode will then search across multiple websites to find real-time ticket options that meet your specific requests.

items.title: Fanttik A10 Pro packs a laser and mechanical tape measure into one device for $70 (Save $50)
items.summary:
Fanttik A10 Pro 2-in-1 Digital/Physical Laser Tape Measure

Buy for $70 (Reg. $120)

What we love

You’ve seen mechanical tape measures and you’ve seen laser distance devices, but have you seen an all-in-one before? This device packs both pieces of tech into one device so you can capture up to 165-foot measurements via laser and 9.8-feet using the tape.

more…

items.title: Sequoia names Alfred Lin and Pat Grady as new co-stewards as Roelof Botha steps down
items.summary: Just over three years after taking the reins as the steward of the storied firm, Botha passed the leadership baton to Lin and Grady.

items.title: Let Amazon ship this 48- by 28-inch standing desk to your doorstep for $72 (Reg. $120)
items.summary:
Marsail 48- by 28-inch Electric Standing Desk

Buy for $72 (Reg. $120)

What we love

Most of the standing desks we come across are about 24 inches deep, but this model steps that up to 28 inches. This notable change can certainly help when you have a large display and don’t want to be right up against it.

items.title: Sora is now available on Android in the US, Canada, and other regions
items.summary: The Android version of Sora retains all the features of its iOS counterpart, including the “Cameos” feature, which allows users to generate videos of themselves performing various activities using their own likeness.

items.title: This desk pad packs two Qi charging zones, a smartphone stand, and RGB for $30 (Reg. $60)
items.summary:
Miroddi Desk Pad with Dual Qi Charging and Stand

Buy for $30 (Reg. $60)

What we love

This feature-packed desk pad spans 31.5 by 15.7 inches and boasts not one, but two Qi charging pads. One is for AirPods or a pair of Qi-compatible earbuds while the other is for a smartphone. I like that the smartphone portion can lay flat or prop up your device so you can stay on top of notifications.

more…

items.title: Anker’s new compact USB-C charger with retractable cable is down to just $26 today (All-time low)
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find Anker’s official storefront offering its latest 35W Nano USB-C charger for $25.99 with free shipping with Prime members or in orders over $35. This charger hit the scene a couple of months back carrying a $40 price tag as part of the brand’s Nano series. It didn’t see a discount during the recent fall Prime Day sale unlike the other new models in the lineup, and it’s now seeing its first deal at 35% off. Today’s deal shaves $14 off its usual going rate, marking a best price to beat. You can get this charger in black and white colors, and they’re both down to the $26 low today. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Today’s Android app deals and freebies: Homo Machina, Angelo and Deemon, more

The early Black Friday deals on Google Pixel 10, 10 Pro/XL, and Fold are still live at up to $300 off, but we also spotted a big-time all-time low on Lenovo’s Legion Tab Gen 3 Android tablet down at $370 as well as Google’s silver Pixel Watch 4 is $113 off, and some notable offers on the early Samsung holiday sale. As for the apps, everything is waiting for you below.

I’ve said it before and I’ll say it again, I made the switch to ratcheting belts and don’t think I’ll ever go back. They’re much more flexible with this particular model offering 5 adjustments per inch.

ESR AirPods 4 Carabiner Case

What we love

While AirPods Pro retain MagSafe compatibilty, the same cannot be said for AirPods 4. For some reason Apple dropped support for it and this case adds it back. Bear in mind that if you want to charge using MagSafe or an Apple Watch puck, you’ll still need the ANC version of AirPods 4.

items.summary: Elon Musk is pushing for a $1 trillion performance pay package. Another major shareholder has said no.

items.title: Shopify says AI traffic is up 7x since January, AI-driven orders are up 11x
items.summary: Shopify is bullish on AI-powered shopping agents, citing AI as an "incredible tool" to enable more entrepreneurs and calling it the "biggest shift in technology since the internet" during its third-quarter earnings call.

items.title: Netflix in talks to license video podcasts from iHeartMedia, report says
items.summary: Netflix is looking for exclusivity, which means that video podcasts that it licenses could no longer be uploaded to YouTube.

items.title: Some stinkbugs’ legs carry a mobile fungal garden
items.summary: A dedicated organ grows the fungus, which deters parasitic wasps.

items.title: Phone location data of top EU officials for sale, report finds
items.summary: Journalists in Europe found it was "easy" to spy on top European Union officials using commercially obtained location data sold by data brokers, despite the continent having some of the strongest data protection laws in the world.

items.title: Anthropic projects $70B in revenue by 2028: Report
items.summary: The Information reports that Anthropic expects to generate as much as $70 billion in revenue and $17 billion in cash flow in 2028. The growth projections are fueled by rapid adoption of Anthropic’s business products, a person with knowledge of the company’s financials said.

items.title: Tesla’s Master Plan 4 still lacks specifics ahead of $1T Musk pay vote
items.summary: Despite its imprecision, the fourth "Master Plan" is a centerpiece of Tesla's case for giving CEO Elon Musk $1 trillion in company shares.

items.title: Spotify now has half a million video podcasts, which nearly 400M users have watched
items.summary: Spotify says that users' time spent with video content on Spotify has more than doubled year-over-year, largely driven by video podcasts.

items.title: WhatsApp launches long-awaited Apple Watch app
items.summary: For the first time, WhatsApp users will be able to use their Apple Watch to get call notifications, read full messages, record and send voice messages, and view media content more clearly.

items.title: Nvidia, Deutsche Telekom strike €1B partnership for a data center in Munich
items.summary: Nvidia has signed a €1 billion partnership with Deutsche Telekom to set up an "AI factory" in Munich that aims to boost Germany's AI computing power by 50%.

items.summary:
